programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: El Team Tendo le organiza una fiesta de 15 a su Matrioska y los Shores se entregan al festejo como solo ellos saben hacerlo. Todo es diversión hasta que una discusión inesperada excede todos los límites.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw finds a rare 18th-century puzzle jug, and Claire Rawle some Shelley porcelain. Paul discovers how Hull was vital to thousands of Jews fleeing from Tsarist Russia and Claire indulges her passion for all things railway.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: In the final, Paul Laidlaw hopes a late 17th-century hand-forged halberd head will earn him a huge profit. Claire Rawle buys a Chinese cloisonné vase and an Edwardian inkstand. Will Claire be the comeback kid and crush the mighty Laidlaw?

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion and Mark Stacey take their classic car to an auction in Merseyside. Christina detours to learn about the history of the British seaside in Bognor Regis and Mark visits the last surviving Victorian Brickworks in Britain.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion and Mark Stacey's antiquing adventure continues in the Cotswolds. Mark discovers a rural idyll that inspired a best seller novel while Christina learns about an incredible war hero.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: In Cheshire, Christina Trevanion ends up deep underground and Mark Stacey finds himself in such a predicament he has to call for help! Mark finds a Home Guard practice rifle while Christina makes a peculiar purchase of a human jaw.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion and Mark Stacey travel in the West Midlands in their classic car. Mark visits the factory that profited from the Victorian obsession with death. Christina learns why the original Land Rover became a global phenomenon.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's a race to the finish! Just twenty pounds separates Christina Trevanion and Mark Stacey. Mark is literally stuck and struggling waist-deep in antiques. Christina moves into property and buys a rather unique home.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw visit the West Coast of Scotland. Military buff Paul gets excited when he finds some desk ink stamps dating from the Cold War. Natasha ends up on ice as she gets to grips with an ancient sport in Ayrshire.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Cumbria is the destination for Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw and their classic Mercedes. Natasha visits a mint cake factory while Paul discovers an intriguing side to Cumbria's wartime past.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A return visit to Coughton Court in Warwickshire where the experts get excited about an Agatha Christie letter, a medal awarded to those who came to the aid of the Titanic survivors and a rare china figure of the Queen on horseback.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visits Sydney in Australia. Amongst the items under scrutiny are pieces of furniture made by convicts, a part of the keel of Captain Cook's ship, The Endeavour, and one collector receives one of the biggest valuations in Roadshow history.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team heads to Norwich where, in the Cathedral cloisters, they uncover more treasures. Amongst the items are a letter from Lord Nelson, a series of portraits depicting ancestors of Walt Disney, and correspondence from John Lennon's Aunt Mimi.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: We revisit the cloisters of Norwich Cathedral. The team uncovers original illustrations from Black Beauty, a rare saucer used for many years as an ashtray is valued at £1,000, and some fragments of porcelain remind of the events that destroyed Hiroshima.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team travel to Londonderry. Amongst the items under scrutiny are the most intricately produced hand cut pictures to ever appear on the programme, a cache of silver valued at over GBP100,000 and a cushion woven from human hair.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel introduces unscreened finds from recent venues. Amongst the treasures are a pair of figures that narrowly escaped a bombing raid in World War 2, a recipe book with hair raising potions and a painting by one of Queen Victoria's children.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the experts set up camp in Somerset. Amongst the items are a set of chairs that witnessed the battle of Trafalgar, a postcard collection valued at GBP100,000 and a vicars wife confesses to a weakness for vintage underwear.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In Somerset, Michael Aspel and the team discover more intriguing finds including one of the rarest pieces of silver ever found on the Roadshow, a car powered by steam, and a set of original illustrations for Winnie the Pooh draw gasps when valued.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In the Royal Exhibition Building, in Melbourne, Australia, Michael Aspel and the team uncover a rich vein including relics from the days of gold strikes, a flag flown at the battle of Trafalgar and a sad-looking bear with a jaw-dropping value.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel brings the season to a close with a reminder of this season's greatest finds and introduces follow up stories on some of the objects brought under the expert's scrutiny. Amongst the items featured is a painting that triggers a bidding war.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team kick off their 30th anniversary celebrations in Hereford.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team head to Arundel Castle in Norfolk for a second visit.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team survey antiques and heirlooms in Northumberland.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: The owner of Utah's The Fifth realized too late that running a successful bar wasn't as easy as his dad made it look, and now he's poised to squander his family's legacy.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: An inexperienced bar owner calls on Jon after hiring a hard-partying manager with no industry knowledge to run Broadway Club in Tooele, Utah.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: In Layton, Utah, Jon confronts Brandon, the emotionally exhausted owner of Linda Lou's Time for Two, who has bled himself and his mother dry trying to keep the bar open.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is in Midvale, Utah, to meet The Union owner Bill, who is over $500,000 in debt and hasn't picked up any of the bar knowledge required to help his staff.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is brought in to save The Sandbar in Albuquerque, New Mexico, but before he can save the failing beach-themed bar, he has to figure out who the actual owner is first.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is in New Mexico to help Mike, the owner of Lucky 66 Bowl, who is over a million dollars in debt and keeps driving customers and employees out the door with his temper.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is in Albuquerque, New Mexico, to help Commander Rudy and his staff recruit young veterans to become members and inject new life into his VFW Post 6216 bar and hall.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon visits Tracy, California, to help the divorced owners of Grant Bar & Lounge clean up their act and bring cohesion to their competing nightclub/restaurant concept.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: When the owner of Jolt'n Joe's in San Diego was diagnosed with cancer, he began leaning on his manager, but a broken promise over equity threatens to run the bar into the ground.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon travels to Oakland, California, to help Marshawn Lynch turn around his bar, Rob Ben's, by teaching the NFL star to treat his staff less like family and more like a team.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon, joined by rapper T-Pain, is in Sacramento, California, to convince Kings fan Chris he needs to change his sports bar concept if he's ever going to make money.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon heads to the Silver Dollar in Chula Vista, California, where the unresolved tensions between the father and son owners have led to operational issues and neglect.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon does reconnaissance at Kalaveraz Cocina-Cantina in Escondido, California, and finds an owner so in over his head that he's resorted to not paying his staff.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon heads to Pepe's Mexican Restaurant & Cantina in Canyon Lake, California, to help a once-bustling bar that's now a ghost town and open the disconnected owners' eyes.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him until they can get him to his mother, but he seems to be hiding a deep dark secret. Meanwhile, CJ falls for a handsome young man who turns out to be taboo.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. CJ has a great time working with Father Ryan but starts to worry that he may misinterpret her warmth as flirting, and that he may be considering quitting the priesthood for her.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Logan's visa is soon to expire, and he will be sent back to Australia unless he gets a green card. He plans on earning the money to purchase one in an upcoming boat race. Meanwhile Mitch’s mother visits.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must stop the terrorist before she blows up an oil rig with Stephanie constrained inside it!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she has a terminal illness. With the team being short-staffed it is up to Logan and Caroline to deal with reckless wave runners.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover. Caroline resuscitates a man with AIDS, which puts a strain on her relationship with Logan. And CJ enters a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died. Mitch and his father never saw eye-to-eye, but this gift impacts Mitch more than he ever thought possible. Logan visits a hypnotist to deal with a past trauma.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service in order to remain on the active roster. But Andy's strong-arm tactics do not sit well with the other lifeguards.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well. Meanwhile, Mitch must rescue a boy's brother from drug smugglers so the boy can receive a life-saving transplant of his brother's bone marrow.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it. Mitch must help the Chinese woman find her sister. Back at headquarters, Matt and Garner deal with a beach robbery scam.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts, putting the lifeguards on high alert. Meanwhile, Mitch has to save one of Kaye's employees whose violent husband has come looking for her.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Hobie is thrilled when the “Johnny Danger Stunt Show" comes to the beach, but Mitch finds Johnny has questionable morals and is worried Hobie may follow his example. Matt is accused of sexual harassment by bad girl lifeguard Neely.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again. The explosion of an offshore oil rig endangers Stephanie, Cody, and Neely.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: As the crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, Cody, Neely, and Stephanie begin a desperate rescue effort to save the two young couples, and themselves, until the Baywatch lifeguards can arrive to help.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Undefeated Welterweight Ukrainian champ Yaroslav Amosov puts his belt on the line against Jamaican Jason Jackson.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to Hollywood, Florida with an explosive night of fights. Champion Eddie Alvarez defends his belt against Lightweight Tournament Winner Michael Chandler in one of Bellator MMA's most epic fights.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes to Irvine with two belts on the line! First Pat Curren defends his Featherweight belt against Patricio 'Pitbull' Freire. Then in the main event, Michael Chandler takes on Rick Hawn for the Lightweight World Championship.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to Thackerville, Oklahoma as Ben Askren defends his Welterweight belt against Season 7 tournament winner Karl Amoussou. Plus the Bellator MMA debut of King Mo fighting in his home state.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to Atlantic City, NJ with the Featherweight Championship belt on the line! Champion Pat Curran defends his title against Season 8 Featherweight tournament winner Shahbulat Shamhalaev.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes to Rio Rancho, NM. Welterweight Champion Ben Askren takes on Welterweight season 8 tournament winner Andrey Koreskov. Then Michael Chandler defends his Lightweight belt against the Lightweight season 8 tournament winner David Rickels.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Michael Chandler once again goes up against Eddie Alvarez in a rematch for the Lightweight title. Also, Pat Curran defends his Featherweight belt against Daniel Straus and King Mo takes on Emanuel Newton for the Light Heavyweight title.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes to Atlantic City, NJ. The Heavyweight belt is on the line as champion Alexander Volkov takes on Vitaly Minakov. Then in the main in the event Quinton 'Rampage' Jackson makes his Bellator MMA debut against Joey Beltran.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil exposes an online dating fraud -- a catfish -- accused of duping as many as 26 women into relationships. What were the red flags the women missed? Plus, a Dr. Phil producer tracks the catfish down -- and you won’t believe who they find!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his mission to end the silence on domestic violence. More than 25 percent of battered women remain in a relationship with their abuser. Sonya fears that she is one of those women who stay. Hear her story.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: If you're in difficult economic times & looking for ways to save money, start taking notes! Dr. Phil's guests offer tips to help save on clothes, utilities & vacations. Learn how to cut your grocery bill in half & how to entertain family inexpensively.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Angie says stepfather Ralph routinely sexually abused her as a teen. Angie says that her stepfather didn't stop with her, he turned his attention, affection & sexual abuse toward her daughter Hannah. They say grandma Leta knew, yet looked the other way.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Do you have a relative scheming to get money from a rich aunt, uncle or even parents when they pass away?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Melissa says Destoni, 14, is an aggressive, violent bully. She's chased her sister with a butcher knife, yells at teachers in the hallways but Destoni crossed a line when she threatened to shoot her teacher and other students, causing suspension. Part 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Thomas Cogdell was 12 when he and his mom discovered his 11-year-old sister, Kaylee, dead, tied up on her bed. Now 18, Thomas shares what he experienced on that fateful day. Don't miss this compelling look at false confessions & justice gone wrong.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his conversation with Trisha, a mother and wife, who is live-streaming her entire life. Find out what caused Trisha to storm off and collapse on stage. Did Dr. Phil almost have to call the paramedics? Pt. 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Caroline & Sonny admit their nearly 3-yr marriage has been tumultuous with both sides alleging verbal & physical abuse. The situation worsened when the unthinkable happened: Sonny cheated on Caroline with her sister, Ashley, after a night of drinking.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Jean says her 17-year-old daughter, Cheyenne, was the all-American girl , a cheerleader, track star and straight-A honor student until she began dating Josh, a 28-year-old divorced father. Dr. Phil takes a look at Josh's history, should Jean be concerned?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Mark & ex-wife, Melissa, say daughter, Malia, 17, has been running away since age 13, a 6th grade school drop out, & has become physically abusive. They say 2 years ago she became involved with a 35-year-old man & they fear she'll end up dead.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Is it wrong to go dating for dollars? Dr. Phil's guests say if you want to court them, you have to pay to play! Two self-proclaimed gold diggers share their tips for getting loot, and a woman wonders if it's wrong to be attracted to wealthy men.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Stacey & Dan say daughter Tylor, 18, is a rageaholic who is verbally, mentally & physically abusive. They have called the police 30 times, have had Tylor arrested 10 times & now Tylor is 7 weeks pregnant! Can this family join forces for the unborn child?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Anita, 73, married to the CEO of fast food restaurant chain Wendy's, is a felon, convicted of scamming friends & employees out of a half million dollars. Anita said she was duped by Ohio State, NFL quarterback, Art Schlichter. Victim or co-conspirator?

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Weird: The Al Yankovic Story" star Daniel Radcliffe stops by to chat.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Chef Remi Cruz is joining Drew in the kitchen to whip up some delicious fried mac n' cheese bites. The world's oldest female comedian Dionne Forest is doing a hilarious stand-up set.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Comedian Celeste Barber, known for her hilarious celebrity parodies, joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover the latest headlines including the one perk employees most wish their employer would offer and share Rihanna's latest collab.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up and covering topics like the solutions you can try if you're a chronic late texter and the reason many people are opting for environmentally friendly burials.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Entertainment Tonight's Kevin Frazier and Nischelle Turner are joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk for a special Oscars themed Drew's News, sharing their predictions for the awards show.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Last Thing He Told Me" star Jennifer Garner is getting a big birthday surprise from Drew.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: A League of Their Own" star Abbi Jacobson opens up about her recent engagement, her bestie Ilana Glazer, what it was like co-creating, writing, producing and starring in "A League of Their Own" and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Bill Nye The Science Guy are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, Chef Pilar Valdes reveals five essential pantry items and turns them into a delicious dish.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, it's an all-new Cookbook Club with "Half Baked Harvest" author Tieghan Gerard who is whipping up Finish Spicy Shrimp Tacos.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Lena Dunham on her new medieval comedy film "Catherine Called Birdy." Plus, Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Former first lady Michelle Obama is telling Drew about how she remains grounded, raising kids with social media and the inspiration for her new book, "The Light We Carry.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner Anya Taylor-Joy stops by to chat with Drew about her new film "The Menu." Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Culinary legend Ina Garten joins Drew at the news desk to break down the latest food headlines including desserts only invites and the gravestone recipe trend.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The cast of "Daisy Jones and the Six" talk with Drew about their new show! They're chatting all about the 70's theme of the show, their time on set and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny side up in an all-new Drew's News covering everything from rumors of the next actor cast as James Bond as being someone in their 30s.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are covering the hottest headlines in an all-new Drew's News like the study that found laughter can be a giveaway for romantic attraction.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actress Susan Sarandon joins Drew to chat about her new country music drama "Monarch." Plus, Susan joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk to help serve the news sunny side up.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is chatting with actress Katherine Heiglabout the return of "Firefly Lane" and more.Plus, inan all-new Drew's News, Katherine Heigl joinsDrew and Ross Mathewsat the news desk to hit the headlines.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Neighborhood" star Cedric the Entertainer is telling Drew about his twenty years of marriage and being back on the road again doing comedy shows.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Magnolia Network's" Joanna Gaines and Drew are going roller skating and chatting everything home renovation.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: CBS Mornings Co-Hosts Gayle King, Tony Dokoupil and Nate Burleson join Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk breaking down everything.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The celebration continues, and Drew's birthday twin Rachel Dratch has a delicious surprise for her when she joinsDrew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Cameron Diaz cook and chat about their culinary adventures. Andrea Lavinthal recreates Drew's past looks.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew, Comedian Matt Rogers, and Ross Mathewsare hitting the headlines in an all-new Drew's News. Drew-crew member Pilar Valdesistalking all about hosting your first holiday.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania" star William Jackson Harper is telling Drew about his role in the new Marvel film, why he took his dog to a pet psychic and how he met his girlfriend.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The chef for the Academy Awards, Wolfgang Puck is telling Drew about the menu for this year and making one of his signature dishes served at the Oscars – the prime mini burger!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The cast of "Emily in Paris" including Lily Collins, Ashley Park, Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu and Lucas Bravo stop by to chat about the new season. The cast is also participating in an "Emily in Paris" style makeover for a deserving audience member.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is evicted because his 50 cent allowance won't cover the rent. The other Clampetts take over the space with Granny will cut hair or pull teeth. Jed will sharpen tools and whittle something. Ellie is the pretty receptionist.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: With the Clampetts established in business in Jethro's vacated office space, a building inspector visits to find out about their business operations on the 5th floor.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale hires a troubleshooter for the bank. His main mission is to get the Clampetts to close their business operating out of the 5th floor.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Sam Drucker comes to Beverly Hills to visit, and Granny assumes he's interested in courting her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro meets Mrs. Drysdale's guru and decides he wants to be one also. Granny thinks it's all nonsense, but when she tries to put a stop to it the followers find her common sense inspiring and make her the head guru.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Drysdales now jog so the banker can get the account of Jason Detweiler, head of a running club. The Clampetts don't understand the concept, leading to misunderstandings, then Ellie and Jethro become enthusiastic.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Famous singer Pat Boone is in the neighborhood and smells Granny's cooking. He wanders into their backyard and the Clampetts befriend him, thinking he's a hill country man down on his luck.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The hillbillies move back to the hills to find Elly May a husband, much to the dismay of banker Drysdale.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts arrive in the mountain town of Silver Dollar City, where Granny starts a feud with an old rival, Elverna Bradshaw.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny continues her efforts to get Elly May married, extolling the young girl's virtues to every bachelor she meets.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Bird watcher Jane Hathaway hikes into the woods and finds a man for Elly May.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts rehearse for Elly May's wedding to backwoodsman Matthew Templeton, unaware that banker Drysdale wants it stopped.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Drysdale and Jane arrive in New York to persuade the hillbillies to abandon their half-built cabin in Central Park and return home.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny insists she doesn't need glasses, although she carries on a conversation with a pet seal, thinking it's Elly's new boyfriend.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Shorty Kellems, proprietor of the hotel in Silver Dollar, sells out and leaves the hills to join the Clampetts in California.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny uses her shotgun as she punishes Jethro for leading too wild a Hollywood life with Shorty Kellems.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale's nephew, who possesses a wealth of confidence but no talent, takes over Drysdale's private office at his Beverly Hills Bank.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts visit Hooterville and Jed arranges to go into the airline business with pilot Steve Elliott.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Banker Drysdale eagerly prepares to set up the deal for a new airline formed by Jed and farmer Howard Hewes, thinking him the famous millionaire Howard Hughes.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Clampett and Shad Heller conspire to line up Shorty Kellems as a husband for the strong-minded widow, Elverna Bradshaw.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The hillbillies unsuccessfully conspire to get Shorty Kellems married to Elverna Bradshaw.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elusive Shorty Kellems gets off the marital hook by convincing his eager bride-to-be that he is an inveterate gambler.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed and Shad Heller discover it's a full time job keeping Shorty Kellems corralled until his marriage to the indomitable Elverna.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Shorty Kellms again short circuits fiancee Elverna's wedding plans, this time by marrying Mr. Drysdale's prettiest secretary.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts set up a miniature farm so Shorty's bride Gloria can sample farm life, and soon the exhausted girl is delighted to hear she's not really married.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The hillbillies leave Shorty Kellems temporarily in charge of the Clampett mansion and he turns it into a hotel for single secretaries.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampett mansion is set up as a hotel for women, and banker Drysdale decides to extort a few dollars from his secretary guests.

programme.desc: (S03E004) While Donna works as a model in Paris, David wonders whether his heart belongs to Donna.

programme.desc: (S03E005) Brenda pretends to be French to spend time with an American student in Paris.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Tired of the constant fighting over who the best tattoo artist is, Ceaser decides to have the Black Ink artists put their art where their mouth is by conducting the first Black Ink tattoo competition to crown the lead artist.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Alex struggles with quarantining and his relationship with Donna, Tatti heads to Long Island to check on her family, and Krystal performs at Ted's showcase.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: As the crew gets ready to return to New York, Ceaser plans a final party in Atlanta and stuns Suzette when he gets down on one knee. Walt goes to extreme lengths to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The team is back from their Atlanta residency but quickly find out - what happens in Atlanta doesn't stay in Atlanta. Ceaser and the crew throw a block party to help stop the spread of Covid in the community by offering free tattoos for vaccines.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser holds a press conference in an attempt to clear his name, but when Ted doesn't show up to stand by him, he seeks support from an unlikely place. Spyder and Rok get to the bottom of what's been causing problems between them.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: After the success of the Black Ink Battle in Atlanta, Puma decides, with Ceaser out of town, it's time for a Battle of the Sexes! Bae holds a walk for both Black Lives Matter and Stop Asian Hate with the support of the whole crew.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Bae finds out that her client from the tattoo competition had a negative experience with the Girls' Team. Ted and Krystal start preparing for an upcoming music video, and Ceaser fixes the failed Puma Production by bringing in an old friend.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser and Puma plan a huge billboard photo shoot with the help of Sassy, but then everything goes left. Ted gives Krystal an ultimatum, Rok has a family emergency and Ceaser gets some devastating news about his daughter.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: In the fallout of the court's decision, Ceaser steps into another crisis when Suzette learns she's facing serious health issues. Spyder celebrates his good health news by hosting a COVID-safe party. It's time to Mask-erade!

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Puma takes his family and in-laws on a luxury glamping trip on the land he co-owns at Chace Village. Ceaser invites Black Ink Chicago's very own Van to look after the shop while he confronts Suzette in Atlanta about their relationship.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Newly single Ceaser returns to New York on a mission to improve Black Ink, only to find his partners, Ted and Puma, are absent. Alex's equanimity might be failing as he seems to have it out for Ceaser.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Mama Bae is finally back in New York. Tatti hosts a male-free event at the shop while the guys take Bux out on the town. Ted invites the crew to a private screening of his movie premiere and reveals some shocking news.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: With Ceaser and the bosses in Milwaukee for Ted's grand opening, the Brooklyn crew plays hooky with an unexpected guest. Ceaser deals with a crisis in Atlanta that has the whole crew scrambling while Rok and Krystal go MIA.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: As the artists keep the Atlanta shop running, Rok and Krystal's late arrival puts them in Ceaser's crosshairs. Tatti proposes a new role for her future at Black Ink, while Bae wonders how her friends will receive her new boyfriend.

programme.title: Everybody Hates Chris
programme.desc: Chris reluctantly agrees to hold onto a stash of marijuana for a criminal on the run, but he finds it difficult to find an appropriate hiding place that won't get him in trouble.

programme.title: Everybody Hates Chris
programme.desc: As punishment for Chris' disruption of history class, Chris and his classmates are given the assignment of memorizing a famous speech from World War II and reciting it in front of the class.

programme.title: Everybody Hates Chris
programme.desc: After Chris gets his driver's license, Rochelle and Julius give him permission to buy a car, but when the car is stolen and vandalized Chris realizes owning a car is a huge responsibility.

programme.title: Everybody Hates Chris
programme.desc: Chris decides to take a stand against his mother, Rochelle and refuses to do his household chores, causing Rochelle to complain to Julius that her son is disrespecting her.

programme.title: The Parkers

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: The entire team congregates at the empty Valley Oak One house for cocktails and dancing.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff and his business partner Ryan have taken on a historic restoration project to cope with the changing real estate market; Jeff's new boss accuses him of not working hard enough.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff gets the wrong shade of drapes and has a meltdown; Jeff commissions an original abstract portrait for Zoila as a special birthday gift.

programme.title: Dalziel and Pascoe
programme.desc: When Detective Dalziel is accused of a crime and suspended from the force, Inspector Pascoe must search for the truth.

programme.title: Dalziel and Pascoe
programme.desc: Dalziel and Pascoe discover a man's body in an abandoned elevator shaft.

programme.title: Dalziel and Pascoe
programme.desc: a mysterious stranger claims to be a wealthy woman's long-lost son; when he is found murdered, Dalziel and Pascoe are called in to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: Dalziel and Pascoe
programme.desc: After Dalziel witnesses a shooting, the prime suspect claims it was a suicide.

programme.title: Dalziel and Pascoe
programme.desc: Pascoe finds evidence that his grandfather deserted during World War I.

programme.title: BritBox Mysteries
programme.desc: Looking for the best in British mystery? Get a clue and join these iconic investigators on the beat as they pit their wits against injustice.

programme.title: Wallander
programme.desc: When an elderly couple is brutally murdered at an isolated farmhouse, Wallander begins to doubt everything.

programme.title: Wallander
programme.desc: Kurt Wallander gets wrapped up in a murderous conspiracy involving the smuggling of human organs.

programme.title: Wallander
programme.desc: A man is violently attacked by a vigilante group; Wallander's investigation widens to another police district as they look for a woman who was on the maternity ward when a nurse was attacked; Wallander confronts how he neglects his family.

programme.title: Drop The Dead Donkey: No More Mr. Nice Guy
programme.desc: Sally gets the assignment in Acapulco; George becomes more mean.

programme.title: Drop The Dead Donkey: Henry's Autobiography
programme.desc: Henry writes his life story; George is in a panic over an interview; Sally shoots a fitness video.

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: To get some time away from his future bride Sophie, Mark joins a gym.

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Jeremy is thrilled when one of his musical heroes, The Orgazoid, employs him as a general handyman.

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Jeremy arranges Mark a canal boat stag weekend but soon finds himself distracted by the beautiful Aurora.

programme.title: Peep Show

programme.title: Black Books

programme.title: Black Books

programme.desc: Grumio is sent to work for another master after injuring his slave, later prompting a rebellion.

programme.title: Plebs: The Weatherist

programme.title: Mr. Bean: Merry Christmas Mr. Bean

programme.title: Mr. Bean

programme.title: The IT Crowd
programme.desc: Jen has found love and is hosting a dinner party with her new bloke Peter and six of their single friends.

programme.desc: Conquistador coffee campaign; Repeating groove; Ramsey MacDonald striptease; Job hunter; International Chinese Communist Conspiracy; Crelm Toothpaste/Shrill petrol; Agatha Christie sketch (railway timetables).

programme.title: Monty Python's Flying Circus
programme.desc: World revolutionaries are quizzed about football scores; figures from works of art go on strike throughout galleries in England; the search continues for a cure for over-acting; Viking marauders kidnap Englishmen who ask for canned ham.

programme.title: Monty Python's Flying Circus
programme.desc: Miners brawl over historical facts; hospital patients serve the doctors; five shipwrecked mariners decide whom they will have for dinner.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ciudad despiadada

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC busca un móvil y un sospechoso cuando las víctimas se encuentran en los inodoros de las paradas de camiones a lo largo de las carreteras en todo el sur.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 7/23/2017. Tracing the origins of topical humor from the invention of the monologue to the fake news shows of today.

programme.title: American Style
programme.desc: Aired 01/13/2019. During a time of unprecedented expansion in prosperity and consumerism, America felt pressure for conformity as paranoia set in over a growing cold war.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 09/29/2013. With a combination of cultures, New Mexico has the largest Hispanic population per capita in the US. Go with Anthony Bourdain as he explores.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/9/2017. Tracking the evolution of inappropriate humor throughout history, showcasing the work from groundbreaking comedians who risked their careers, prison sentences, and even their lives as they fought against censorship.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/16/2017. Exploring and celebrating the greatest female comedians of all time and how they were able to succeed in every genre where humor is found despite rampant sexism and prejudice.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/23/2017. Examining how comedians find humor in the simple daily experiences we all share to make us laugh.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies search a suspicious vehicle behind a strip club. A man threatens to shoot employees at a car rental company. A man tosses lip balm filled with narcotics out the window during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: While attempting to break up a fight between two women an officer is attacked by one of the brawler’s boyfriends. Officers confiscate a negligible amount of marijuana from a man during a routine traffic stop. A man is arrested for domestic abuse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speeds of 100mph.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver pursued by police bails from her moving vehicle, a jaywalker decides to run from officers, and a patrol encounters a little boy who decided to run away from home.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A DUI suspect with a suspended license claims he’s not drunk. Officers track an armed robber. An armed and dangerous suspect hides from officers in an apartment complex.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman claims a man abused her then put a curse on her. Police arrest a man for having illegal drugs on him. An elderly woman locks herself in the restroom at a bank.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle traveling up to 100mph on a local freeway. An officer is dispatched to a larceny in progress at a local convenience store. A man threatens an elderly woman at their residence.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: When officers approach, a suspect flees into a fast-food restaurant. A driver takes his granny's wheels for a dangerous spin with cops in pursuit. Sheriffs catch up to a man who fled the scene of a possible domestic battery.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police have a breakthrough in a burglary case, a man found with drugs in his pants claims the pants are not his, and officers deal with a familiar domestic disturbance call.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers try to calm an agitated and disoriented man before he hurts himself or someone else, and a driver going 2 MPH on a highway catches the attention of a patrol car.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers pursue a male suspect in a speeding truck and ultimately force the vehicle off the road, the suspect is taken into custody without injury. Officers respond to a domestic abuse call. Officers are called to a home where a dead body is found.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers coordinate a prostitution sting. Officers pull over a vehicle with a missing license plate. Officers stop a woman driving a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers wrestle with a familiar nuisance to shop owners, a man's lucky dollar lets him down during a traffic stop, and too much whiskey leads to a domestic disturbance call.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Numerous patrol cars give chase to a man on a dirt bike refusing to yield, and an alleged armed robber is upfront about his reasons for running from police when approached.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who attempt to purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A desperate suspect flees from the cops after shots are fired, and a father and daughter are caught off-guard when they run into a man wielding a screwdriver.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A resistant suspect thinks he sees monsters everywhere. Cops are forced to officiate a spousal wrestling match. Officers try to sort out where two motorists got their car and whose dope they possess.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers dispatch the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspect who flees on foot. A suspicious male walking down the street is arrested with a large bag containing stolen goods and drug paraphernalia.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers smell the pungent odor of marijuana during a minor traffic violation. Cocaine is found on a suspect pulled over for a broken windshield. A store is robbed by someone in a red dress.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Suspects in a white van throw a bike at police during a wild pursuit. A man runs from Deputies on a mini-bike. A mermaid commits traffic infractions and is caught with pills.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect resisting arrest draws a crowd, a homeless man decides to camp out in someone's house while they're in the hospital and a traffic stop results in a drug arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man loses his friend and finds trouble, officers stop a vehicle they believe was involved in a shooting, and a suspicious vehicle leads to a suspicious story.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Cops pursue a man skipping bail, an impaired driver is surprisingly cooperative, and officers struggle to remove a violent offender from a crime scene.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man gets Tased while resisting arrest, police interrupt a transaction going down in a parked vehicle, and a man fired from his job vents his anger at a gas station.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man involved in a drug deal claims he works for the task force. An irate woman slams the front door when officers arrive. Police pull over two young suspects in an area known for drug activity.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police collect DNA to establish ownership of a sketchy cigarette pack, investigate an assault between elderly roommates, and question a man claiming to be framed by his ex.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team investigate the death of a first class passenger on a flight to Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and Sara investigate a bug riddled body found in the desert. Warrick and Catherine look into the theft of some valuable art.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A woman is abducted from a supermarket. In the store, Grissom finds a bathroom stall door that claims five women have been killed.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A man about to go on trial for arson and the murder of his wife and child seeks assistance from Grissom to help prove his innocence.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A bomb goes off in an office building, killing one and injuring many more. The chief suspect is a security guard who left minutes before the explosion and has knowledge in bomb making.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a single human bone is discovered in the desert, Grissom and Catherine must cover miles of territory to find the rest of the skeleton.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: At a swanky fundraiser, attended by the sheriff, a woman turns up dead in the pool.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A woman is abducted from a mall parking garage. She's raped, beaten, shot and left for dead. Sara collects evidence from her and grows attached to her.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A body is found in a pottery store in what's apparently a robbery that was interrupted.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A couple leaving a restaurant on their anniversary are killed in the street and their car is stolen. The crime scene is compromised when it rains shortly after the CSIs arrive.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The entire team investigates the abduction of the infant child of a well-to-do family. Suspicion immediately falls on the child's parents.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Two teenage girls run over a deaf man with their car, but they didn't kill him - he was already dead.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Nick, and Warrick take the case of a jogger who was killed by a wild animal in the park. It gets complicated when they discover that the jogger had his liver removed after he was killed.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: On the day Grissom has to evaluate his team, a head is found in the trunk of a car. While Gil and Catherine work on the head, Sara and Nick investigate a body in the desert that's missing its head.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: En una elegante recaudación de fondos, a la que asiste el sheriff, una mujer aparece muerta en la piscina.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una mujer es secuestrada en el aparcamiento de un centro comercial. Es violada, golpeada, disparada y dada por muerta. Sara recoge pruebas de ella y se encariña con ella.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Encuentran un cadáver en una tienda de cerámica en lo que parece ser un robo interrumpido.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una pareja que sale de un restaurante en su aniversario es asesinada en la calle y su coche es robado. La escena del crimen se ve comprometida cuando llueve poco después de que lleguen los CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Todo el equipo investiga el secuestro del hijo pequeño de una familia acomodada. Las sospechas recaen inmediatamente sobre los padres del niño.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Dos adolescentes atropellan con su coche a un sordo, pero no lo matan: ya estaba muerto.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Nick y Warrick toman el caso de un corredor que fue asesinado por un animal salvaje en el parque. La cosa se complica cuando descubren que al corredor le extirparon el hígado después de matarlo.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El día que Grissom tiene que evaluar a su equipo, se encuentra una cabeza en el maletero de un coche. Mientras Gil y Catherine trabajan en la cabeza, Sara y Nick investigan un cadáver en el desierto al que le falta la cabeza.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo investiga los continuos asesinatos cometidos por un asesino de firma. El asesino tiene ciertos conocimientos forenses y ha dejado pocas pruebas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo son llamados después de que Tony Braun, un conocido drogadicto, es encontrado muerto en su casa por un jardinero.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Todo el equipo de CSI investiga una desaparición en una universidad local.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom investiga un posible suicidio en una obra de gran envergadura.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando el payaso de la clase del instituto local aparece asesinado, se llama al equipo de CSI para que investigue.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Sara y Warrick son llamados para investigar un apartamento abandonado salpicado de sangre y Nick y Catherine deben examinar a un submarinista muerto alojado en un árbol.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When Horatio is called to the Miami West Detention Center to investigate a murdered inmate, he ends up witnessing three inmates escape.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After a young model is killed by a hit and run driver, Horatio investigates the car's owner, who claims he loaned it out to the guests at his party.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A man harpooned to his yacht leads Horatio into the world of modern-day treasure hunting and the massive greed that goes along with it.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Tennis phenom Lana Walker is taken from her bedroom in the night and the only evidence they have to go on is a purple fiber found in the window frame.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a former rape victim is beaten to within inches of her life, Horatio must enter the world of prisons and parolees to find the culprit.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a robbery/homicide leaves two men dead and a third still alive, Horatio is determined to find out what really happened.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Todd Burton is trying to drive out of the hurricane's fury when he kills a man in the blinding storm and is now accused of vehicular manslaughter.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A gas man is engulfed in invisible flames and dies all of which happens during a qualifying race at the Grand Prix Americas.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio finally closes the case of his brother's murder. He is reunited with Suzie, a former drug user who was involved with his brother.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After a woman is witnessed being attacked by a shark, the CSIs learn that she was murdered prior to being dumped in the water.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A young woman is thrown over the railing of a parking garage, the investigation into her death uncovers evidence that she was killed before the fall.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After a plastic surgery anesthesiologist is found dead from an apparent suicide, Horatio thinks that this could be a case of murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A diamond broker is shot to death in a parking garage, a mentally disabled man witnessed the murder and wants to help Horatio solve the crime.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a man, Juan Marco Varon, who may or may not have tortured Cuban refuges is murdered, the CSIs are called in to investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando ocurre un asesinato durante una carrera de caballos, Horatio y el equipo de CSI descubren que Ryan tiene un vínculo personal con el caso.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Alexx Woods regresa a Miami cuando un asesino pone en peligro la vida de Calleigh y Ryan. Horatio y el equipo de CSI deben investigar.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo de CSI enfrentan cara a cara a un abogado defensor que puede o no estar involucrado en el encubrimiento de un asesinato.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando unos piratas se apoderan de un yate de lujo, el futuro de Delko como CSI se ve amenazado justo cuando su relación con Calleigh pasa al siguiente nivel.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI hace un descubrimiento impactante sobre su víctima de asesinato, mientras Horatio intenta salvar a su hijo de la conducta errática de Julia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una azafata es asesinada en vuelo, Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI descubren todos los trapos sucios de los viajes en avión.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Una violación de domicilio se vuelve mucho más que eso cuando Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI descubren que son el blanco de la mafia rusa.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando la vida de un niño inocente está en peligro, Ryan, a la larga, se ve obligado a traicionar a Horatio Caine y al resto del equipo de CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Un caso de asesinato que involucra cirugía plástica extrema conduce a Horatio Caine hasta Ron Saris, que está vivo y busca vengarse de Julia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una estrella de telerrealidad es asesinada, Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI se adentran en el mundo escandaloso y sensual de un programa de televisión de citas.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI trabajan para averiguar por qué una familia aparentemente normal fue blanco de un brutal ataque con granadas.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga el caso de un hombre hervido vivo, Julia se descontrola y uno de los secretos más oscuros del equipo sale a la luz.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio lucha para salvar a Yelina y cuando Delko se opone a la súplica de Calleigh y ayuda a su peligroso padre, su vida corre peligro.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Mientras la vida de Delko pende de un hilo, Horatio vuelve 12 años en el tiempo para revelar cómo se conocieron y se convirtieron en un equipo los CSI de Miami.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates a string of murders in New York that revolve around an online world, apparently performed by a hit man.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate two eerie murders on Halloween; one, an apparent zombie attack, the other a faked murder/suicide in a house with a spooky past.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team works to solve two seemingly unrelated murders that after investigations are underway turn out to be connected.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates crimes: one involving a model that was killed on a billboard in Times Square, and another centered around a robbery.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the murder of a groom on his wedding day and the appearance of a mysterious box on the hood of Stella’s car.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac travels to Chicago in order to solve the mystery of the 333 caller while the rest of the CSI team works on a murder in a subway car.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the death of a wealthy man in a hip nightclub and the inadvertent shooting of a young boy during a robbery.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the murder of the owner of a posh hotel as well as the death of a teenager that seems to be connected to Peter Pan.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: After a young woman and a prominent judge are murdered, the CSI team works to discover the connection between the two crimes.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the death of a street luger and the mysterious drowning of a woman in a self-sanitizing pay bathroom.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When a trained female assassin comes to New York City, she really puts the CSI New York team members’ abilities to the test.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a little girl and a fire set to her apartment building leaves CSI New York team member Stella feeling guilty and homeless.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A shark washes up on shore unloading a dead body and a bizarre crime scene that leaves the CSI New York team more than puzzled.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A high school dance is interrupted by the killing of the school’s guidance counselor. Meanwhile, the taxi cab serial killer is still on the loose.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Redención (S6 Ep19)
programme.desc: El último pedido de un condenado a muerte lleva a Hawkes a una cárcel de Pensilvania y se enfrenta a un secreto personal justo cuando estalla un motín en la prisión.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Sospechosos inesperados (S6 Ep20)
programme.desc: El asesinato a tiros de un chico de 14 años frente a su hermano de 12 años lleva el deseo de justicia del detective Mac Taylor a otro nivel.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Desde el subsuelo (S6 Ep21)
programme.desc: Cuando una losa de concreto comienza a chorrear sangre en el centro de la ciudad, la investigación del equipo de CSI los lleva a un mundo clandestino de peleas brutales.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Punto de vista (S6 Ep22)
programme.desc: Después de ser herido, Mac observa a sus vecinos mientras se recupera y es testigo de una actividad misteriosa que conduce a asesinato.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Escapada en vacaciones (S6 Ep23)
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI de Nueva York sigue un rastro que dejó Shane Casey y se da cuenta de que por venganza, él tiene en la mira a Danny, que está de vacaciones.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Piso 34 (S7 Ep1)
programme.desc: El miembro más nuevo del equipo de CSI de Nueva York, como bienvenida, se topa con una mujer asesinada en el edificio del laboratorio de criminalística de la policía de Nueva York.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Plática poco amigable (S7 Ep2)
programme.desc: Cuando una joven parece ser estrangulada mientras está en un chat en vivo que Adam presencia, el equipo de CSI debe determinar si fue real o una broma.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Condenado, si lo haces (S7 Ep3)
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran a una pareja golpeada en su casa, el equipo de CSI cree que tiene al sospechoso después de que una madre identifica a su hijo, pero no todo es lo que parece.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Sangre por sangre (S7 Ep4)
programme.desc: Cuando asesinan a un poderoso líder de una pandilla, el equipo de CSI de Nueva York debe encontrar al asesino antes de que estalle una guerra callejera.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Cayó del cielo (S7 Ep5)
programme.desc: Un robo de joyas en el ático de uno de los abogados más poderosos de Nueva York da un giro extraño cuando el caso lleva al equipo de CSI a un hombre en la morgue.

programme.title: CSI: New York: No salten pasos (S7 Ep6)
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI de Nueva York encuentra un cuerpo en un tejado y debe encontrar al asesino que está manipulando la escena del crimen.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Escondite (S7 Ep7)
programme.desc: Con un francotirador suelto en la ciudad de Nueva York, Mac debe revivir un caso de secuestro que podría haber creado uno de los enemigos más letales de la ciudad.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Programado para el desastre
programme.desc: Una mujer de 29 años murió instantáneamente cuando una bomba explotó en su casa. El dispositivo era tan poderoso que la metralla estaba incrustada en las casas al otro lado de la calle.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zoe is facing jail time following the fundraising scandal

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Becky has feelings for Jonah, but she isn't sure what to do with them.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Maya has someone on her mind, and is questioning the house rules Mrs. Matlin has set.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Prom is fast approaching, but Clare is MIA from committee meetings.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zig is hesitant to let Maya see his new place.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zig learns the truth behind some recent events, and now he’s an accomplice to a crime.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Vince has taken Zig in and treated him like family, but his actions have put Zig, and now even Maya, in harm’s way.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s prom time at Degrassi and in a last-minute shot to save his night, Drew plans an elaborate prom-posal.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew agrees to help Dallas salvage Prom and is punished.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Maya fails her CPR and now she can’t spend the summer lifeguarding at the beach with Zig.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Everyone’s spooked by Gloria’s disappearance as strange things continue to happen.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Determined to get to the bottom of Mr. Bane’s creepy info trove, Zoe and Grace break into his car only to discover more incriminating evidence.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zoe attempts to ward off her feelings for an unlikely candidate by leaning into a romance a familiar face.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After months of flirting via e-mail, thirteen-year-old Emma's new love interest, Jordan, is going to be in town. Coincidentally (fatefully?), it's the same night as her mother's high school reunion.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After months of flirting via e-mail, thirteen year-old Emma's new love interest, Jordan, is going to be in town. Coincidentally (fatefully?), it's the same night as her mother's high school reunion.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley has set her sights on becoming Degrassi's School President. Toby, spurred on by their awkward new situation as step-siblings, is frustrated by her unchallenged status and convinces JT to run against her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Terri's sure that no guy will ever want her and she wants to skip the school dance. Spinner seems interested in her though, and Ashley and Paige convince her to let them make her over.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Toby can't stand the idea of Parents Night - the last time his divorced parents were in the same room they had a huge, embarrassing fight.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley and Jimmy's eight-month anniversary is coming up - and so is the question of whether or not to have sex. Paige is playing Juliet opposite Jimmy's English-class Romeo and she's planting doubts in Ashley's mind.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jimmy desperately wants to make the basketball team. But, surprisingly, it looks like Sean is surpassing him as a possible star player.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After a long absence overseas, Ashley's dad is back in town. She's enjoying his company and attention, but something tells her there's a piece of his life that's being kept from her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Lacking real family time at home, Jimmy has been spending more and more time at Ashley's house. He and Toby are like brothers and Kate's begun referring to him as her "third kid".

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Recently diagnosed with a learning disorder, an embarrassed Liberty is ashamed to tell her friends about her tutoring sessions. Emma sees one of Liberty's private sessions and, putting two-and-two together with Liberty's suspicious behaviour, asks J.T.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Sean asks Emma what she's doing tonight, Emma's thrilled - that's a date, right? But nervous Sean is unable to muster the courage to arrange the details and Emma misunderstands his hesitancy as rejection.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Paige decides to start a Spirit Squad at Degrassi, Emma can't believe that the "sexist" sport of cheerleading is being revived. But Manny, who's had years of gymnastics training and is desperate for something to help make her "cool

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley's convinced that she and Terri are going to be the stars of the school talent show, singing her new (and incredibly earnest) ballad. Terri would rather add Paige -- and some fun sparkle -- to the act, but she's not sure how to tell Ashley that.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Faced with the pressure of passing Grade 7 on his second time around and his mother's newest threat to take him back to his unhappy life up north, Sean is beginning to slip into old, angry patterns.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
