programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: A young girl finds herself in a new world of deserts and twinkling stars when she chases her dog through an anomaly.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: The team are faced with capturing a giant Columbian mammoth which has emerged through an anomaly and is causing a rampage on a busy motorway.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: Leek releases a Silurian scorpion at a busy beach after having trapped the rest of the team in his bunker.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: It is only in recent years that experts have unearthed the biggest dinosaurs that ever lived. One monster eclipsed all others, more than seven times as heavy as diplodocus was the immense argentinosaurus.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new generation of carnivores was about to take killing to the next level. At the end of the Cretaceous period, these new hunter killers had spread throughout the globe.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A look at bizarre dinosaurs such as the curious buck-toothed Exipdexipteryx, the amazing four-winged Microraptor and the pot-bellied Nothronychus.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: In 2000, scientists made a groundbreaking discovery, explaining how birds evolved from dinosaurs. However, a deeper investigation put a question mark over everything.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring a dinosaur graveyard in Patagonia to gain a better understanding of dinosaur evolution, particularly the Middle Jurassic period when they became gigantic.

programme.title: Living with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: David Attenborough learns that descendants of the dinosaur age are alive and well. David explores how they survived the catastrophes that wiped out other species.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David travels the world to unravel some of the wonders and puzzles of palaeontology. But how do you find the world's oldest and rarest reptile?

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: Could pterodactyls fly? And why did trilobites have such good eyes? David Attenborough investigates the secret lives of animals from the past, as told in the fossil record.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers dinosaur bones in the Sahara desert and visits the biggest, most spectacular dinosaur displays in the world.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers bizarre creatures of the earliest seas, tiny horses the size of spaniels and an animal that's half bird and half reptile - the rarest of them all.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The evolution of the predators who lived 550 million years ago, and how the first amphibians migrated from sea to land.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Three hundred million years ago, the forests were ruled by insects. This was a world in which giant dragonflies battled with two-foot-wide spiders.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Five Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors face the dangers of the Death Zone. The High Council of Time Lords recruits an unlikely ally to rescue them.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Five Doctors
programme.desc: Is there a traitor amongst the High Council - and what is the secret of Rassilon?

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Five Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors confront the traitor in Rassilon's Tomb, but even victory will have consequences for the Doctor.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Resurrection Of The Daleks
programme.desc: Davros has been kept in suspended animation aboard a prison spacestation but now the Daleks have come to collect him, aided by Commander Lytton and his ‘policemen’.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Resurrection Of The Daleks
programme.desc: Davros has been kept in suspended animation aboard a prison space station but now the Daleks have come to collect him, aided by Commander Lytton and his ‘policemen’.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Resurrection Of The Daleks
programme.desc: As the prison station survivors fight the invaders, the Dalek agents on Earth take extreme measures to protect the time corridor from being used by the Doctor’s friends.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Resurrection Of The Daleks
programme.desc: As the prison station survivors fight the invaders, the Dalek agents on Earth take extreme measures to protect the time corridor from being used by the Doctor’s friends.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani
programme.desc: Gun-runners are on Androzani Minor, supplying the rebellious android-builder Sharez Jek.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani
programme.desc: Salateen tells Peri and the Doctor they are dying from spectrox tomaemia.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani
programme.desc: Jek believes Peri will fall in love with him and the Doctor is caught by the gunrunners.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani
programme.desc: Morgus is ruined, and Jek goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma
programme.desc: The mysterious Professor Edgeworth has kidnapped twin human child genii, Romulus and Remus, and Hugo Lang holds the new Doctor responsible for the destruction of his spaceship.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma
programme.desc: On Jaconda, Mestor’s cruel domination over the planet's population continues while on Titan Three, the Doctor seems to have been blown up in a booby-trapped building.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma
programme.desc: Mestor claims that all he wants is for the Sylvest twins to help him repopulate his home planet but the Doctor knows there’s more to this than meets the eye...

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma
programme.desc: Mestor’s true plan is revealed and the Doctor's old Gallifreyan friend Azmael comes to the realisation that he has been corrupted long enough by the Gastropod leader...

programme.title: Doctor Who: Attack of the Cybermen
programme.desc: The Cybermen are hiding in the London sewers and turning humans into semi-cybernetic slaves. On Telos, two slaves make a bid for freedom and find a way to escape the planet for good.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Attack of the Cybermen
programme.desc: On Telos, the Doctor is reintroduced to the Cyber Leader and meets the Cryons, the planet’s original inhabitants who want their planet back and will go to any lengths to do so…

programme.title: Doctor Who: Vengeance on Varos
programme.desc: When the Tardis runs low on Zeiton-7 the Doctor must visit the planet Varos, a mining colony ruled by a brutal regime that encourages public torture and executions.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Vengeance on Varos
programme.desc: The Doctor and Peri must escape the Punishment Dome, a sadistic system of entertainment and political control on Varos.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Vengeance on Varos
programme.desc: The governor of Varos begins to suspect someone is working against him. The alien Sil puts his plans into motion.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Vengeance on Varos
programme.desc: The governor faces the punishment dome alongside Peri whilst the Doctor fights to stop the evil alien Sil.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Two Doctors
programme.desc: The Second Doctor and Jamie visit space station Camera to speak to the scientist Dastari.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Two Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctor and Peri meet Jamie and learn the Second Doctor is with the Sontarans on Earth.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A ridgeback/boxer mix's high energy develops into severe aggression; a couple's whippets bark and lunge at any dog that comes inside the boutique.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Daschund Lotus is very territorial; his aggression sends his owner Chari to the hospital; Cesar makes a house call to see Joey, a German Shepard who is territorial over the second story of his owner's home.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A French bulldog is nervous around other dogs and occasionally nips at people; a Vizsla who resists going outside due to her fear of cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A couple's Chihuahua mix terrorizes their mastiff and dominates the house; a pit bull is not growing out of his puppy behavior.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive English bulldog/Lab mix; a cocker spaniel with a life-threatening appetite for paper products.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Labrador mix with dog aggression; a Jack Russell terrier and a Queensland heeler whose formerly cordial relationship has become hostile.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Maltese hates being on his leash; an American Eskimo barks and circles strangers who enter the house; a Nova Scotia duck tolling retriever with a fear of pools.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a pregnant Ashlee Simpson-Wentz's English bulldog with his aggression issues before the baby arrives; a retriever with food aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive sheepdog/collie mix needs extra attention, so Cesar brings him to the Dog Psychology Center; a St. Bernard with a fear of stairs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A dog with a dark side has a knack for stalking and killing small animals; a poodle chases cars; a bulldog has an adverse reaction to skateboarders.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Doberman mix instigates fights at the dog park; a Pomeranian charges other dogs; an aggressive terrier mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Nevada inmates learn how to train dogs to be adopted; an ex-show dog and his companion have a power struggle.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar's toughest cases have included a bulldog that munched on skateboards, a dog that gnawed garden hoses and basketballs, and a pit bull with issues.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps the owner of a grooming business deal with difficult canine clients; a Chihuahua has a barking problem.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog knows very little about Peter, but what he does know, he doesn't like! Not only is he currently facing two counts of second degree sexual assault, about week ago, he dropped out of sight before missing his court date.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years, but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog, Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem -- Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket--Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir-crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources--the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog kick-starts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian is called out to a calf with a large lump, while other patients include a pair of pygmy goats, a farm full of feral cats, and Fern, a sick spaniel. The staff also find time to spring a birthday surprise on Peter Wright.

programme.title: Pet Obsessed
programme.desc: Featuring ridiculous clips, digital shorts and tons of fluff; these are the internet's most outrageous and outspoken pets... A.K.A. your newest obsession!

programme.title: To The Rescue
programme.desc: Tommy rides with Houston Pets Alive! to rescue at-risk dogs from local shelters, ensuring they find loving homes. Featuring Kristen and her co-pilot dog Mogley, their story highlights the transformative power of a second chance.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian gets a panic-stricken call from Alpaca farmer, Jackie Barlow. Two of her alpacas, Gavroche and Francesca, have sneaked into the barn and gorged themselves on the food stash. They’re struggling to breathe, foaming at the mouth and choking.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter has an emergency at the practice in Kirkbymoorside, when a local farming couple rush in their pregnant Texel ewe. Julian operates on a terrier suffering with bladder stones. Peter visits the Green's farm to see a lonely donkey.

programme.title: Animal Attractions
programme.desc: Our Pet Trainer 911 keeps one family afloat by teaching their giant Schnauzer pool manners. Can you train your cat to be a circus star? Our Pet Vet hands out healthy tips for your overweight cat.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy becomes interested in numerology and advises Ricky that it is a good day for him to make any deals he can. However, she soon realizes that she consulted the horoscope from yesterday's newspaper.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Ricky leaves his clothes around the living room, Lucy gets angry and divides the room in half so Ricky can be as messy as he likes - on his side!

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky brings home a $3,500 mink coat to be used in his nightclub act, and Lucy assumes it's her anniversary present. Trying to get the coat away from her becomes a problem because Lucy not only wears it while she does housework, she even sleeps in it.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ethel Mertz interprets a gossip column item to mean that Ricky is interested in one of the chorus girls in his nightclub. Ricky assures Lucy that it's just publicity.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy opens a telegram addressed to Ricky from the War Department ordering him to appear at the Army's Fort Dix. This letter plus the drills Ricky and Fred have been practicing in the living room convince the women that their husbands have been drafted.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy learns that Ricky needs a dancer for his Parisian nightclub act and is determined to get the part. Fred offers to teach her how to dance but Ethel arranges instead to have the nephew of the woman who runs the French laundry to give pointers.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ethel wants Ricky to headline a benefit for her women's club. Lucy will only try to arrange it if she is on the bill as well. After hearing Lucy's terrible singing voice, Ethel is less than eager, but eventually agrees.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy buys a costly dress, and when Ricky tells her to take it back or pay for it herself, she decides to get a job. She answers an ad for a babysitter and finds herself in charge of high-spirited twin boys who are to appear in an amateur contest.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy's neighbor Miss Lewis has a crush on Mr. Ritter, the local grocer but istoo shy to invite him to dinner. Trying to play Cupid, Lucy invites him for her but he gets the idea that Lucy has fallen for him. Apparently Mr. Ritter is fond of Lucy as well.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: In a deception planned to convince Ricky that she ought to be in his new nightclub act, Lucy pretends to have a nervous breakdown. She consults a book on abnormal psychology that reveals three complexes she assumes.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy decides to break into show business by writing a play about a Cuban tobacco picker and entering it in her women's club play competition. Of course she wants Ricky to star in it but he refuses.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Mertzes enjoy an evening singing around the piano with the Ricardos in their apartment. When they retire for the night and Lucy and Ricky continue singing, Ethel phones them demanding quiet.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky needs a ballet dancer and a burlesque comic for his club's new musical revue. Lucy wants the ballet gig and takes dance lessons from a strict instructor. Learning the disciplined art is much more difficult than she imagined.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Peggy, a teenage neighbor, breaks up with her boyfriend Arthur because she is infatuated with Ricky. Lucy tries to help the clumsy schoolboy learn how to dance in order to win back Peggy's affections. To complicate matters more, Arthur falls for Lucy.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel are eager to get a closer look at the belongings of the O'Briens, new neighbors in the building. They snoop around in their apartment while they are away and when they hear the O'Briens return, Lucy is trapped in the closet.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: After the Mertzes have a quarrel the Ricardos try their best to get them back together. Lucy invites each of them to dinner without the other knowing. The Mertzes finally reconcile but in the process, the Ricardos squabble.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy hates the mustache that Ricky grows for a potential movie role and demands that he shave it off. When he refuses, Lucy gets a fake beard and glues it on her face. To teach Ricky a lesson, she kisses her husband with the beard on when he arrives home.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se involucra sentimentalmente con la nueva roommate del Noruego, la cual esconde un oscuro secreto, mientras tanto Peluzín y Jony buscan lanzar a Olaf al estrellato.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego milagrosamente logra que le den un crédito bancario, mientras que Peluzín se aprovecha de una muerte reciente dentro del edificio para su beneficio económico.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un extraño bebé aparece en la puerta de LFDB, quien viene acarreando una ola de destrucción. Ahora la salvación del mundo depende de la Familia del Barrio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín trata de averiguar el paradero de su madre con la ayuda de sus dos nuevos papás, mientras que Gaspar invita al Abuelo, el Noruego y Johnny a el nuevo restaurante de moda.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego sigue con su plan de casarse con la Ivanka de cera, mientras que el Abuelo y Peluzín afianzan su relación después de su gran viaje

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego decide ir a NY a conocer a la verdadera Ivanka pero en el camino el grupo se separa de el Abuelo y Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una oda al prototipo de familia mexicana disfuncional, con el humor y gran atributo para enfrentar cualquier situación.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín adquiere una nueva mascota que revolucionará el vecindario. En tanto el Noruego y Gaspar intentan ayudar a el Lentejas a superar sus extrañas inclinaciones sexuales.

programme.desc: El Noruego emprende en un nuevo negocio con pulgas, mientras que el Abuelo y Jonathan son tomados como rehenes por unos crimínales en un asalto al banco.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Great Games: All-Star

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Catfish Colombia

programme.title: Catfish Colombia

programme.title: Catfish Colombia

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood

programme.desc: Bob Trow picks up the Bob Dog costume from Mister Rogers. Handyman Negri provides both royal birds with a three-cornered hat. Quickly finding a hat to fit Bob Dog, however, proves to be a bit more difficult.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers introduces Mr. Morrison, who is playing the organ. Neighbor Aber says that anytime someone says anything about three-cornered hats, Lady Elaine squirts them with her hose.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are searching for buried treasure at the request of Tsunade's friend Agari Kaisen. Thinking its an easy task since they have a map, Tsunade threatens to send them back to the Academy if they fail.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Naruto discovers Jiraiya is up to no good. Jiraiya claims to be busy getting his manuscript ready before his deadline. Impatient and irritated, Naruto writes his own manuscript for Jiraiya!

programme.desc: Hidden Leaf Village receives a request from the Village Hidden in the Stars to guard a star. The star is actually a meteorite that fell 200 years ago and is said to possess mysterious powers.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Naruto and the others investigate the whereabouts of the stolen star. The team suspects that is an inside job because the ninja who took the star used the ninja art, Kujaku, from the Star Village.

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: A mysterious being attaches itself to Naruto, while he was training in the forest. Tsunade begins to wonder if it isn't the legendary being known as the "Onbaa.

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos

programme.title: Stargate Universe

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: Homeworld Command tries to convince an ally they suspect might be infiltrated by the Lucian Alliance to let them use their planet to power up and dial Destiny. Meanwhile, Rush is trapped in a simulation created by Amanda Perry.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: While exploring a planet, the team is attacked and members are taken captive by an alien creature. The team must turn to Varro and his Lucian team for help. Meanwhile, on Destiny, Eli and Brody mistakenly trap Brody in a cryogenic device.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Daniel appears to O'Neill and alerts him that Anubis has located the Eye of Ra, an object of power hidden on Abydos. With Daniel's help, SG-1 find the Eye first. Determined to have it, Anubis threatens to destroy the planet unless they hand it over.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: As SG-1 begins its search for the Lost City, they discover that Jackson has been returned by the Ancients without any memory of who he was. While SG-1 tries to help him regain his memory, they discover that the Lost City is not on the same planet.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Anubis travels to Kelowna after discovering that it has mines of a more powerful source of energy that he can use to make his new weapon more destructive. The leaders of Kelowna contact SG-1 for their help, but make an ill-advised deal with Anubis.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: A 15-year-old infiltrates the SGC with the startling news that he is Colonel Jack O'Neill, having mysteriously reverse aged 30 years overnight. Possessing O'Neill's knowledge, exact DNA and, above all, his attitude, can he really be O'Neill?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Six thousand light-years away, O'Neill and the SG-1 team discover a devastated universe where the inhabitants must live in a protective dome. They survive through an all-controlling computer system called the Link. But is it a savior, or a curse?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: SG-1 finds a crashed spaceship containing hundreds of people in a cryogenic sleep. Stunned by an unseen weapon, the team is struck unconscious and, upon awakening, discovers that several of the frozen personalities now inhabit Daniel's body!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: An SGC Naquadah mining operation is attacked by a native tribe of Unas. SG-1 is sent to protect the miners and discovers that the Unas are guarding land they believe is sacred. Instead of eradicating the Unas, Daniel races to negotiate with them.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: The Serakkin Warrick proposes to share his planet's technology with Earth in exchange for Carter helping him win a space race. Carter eagerly agrees and copilots the craft through a perilous obstacle course; but the race isn't without risks.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1

programme.desc: After two racecar-driving fleas infest Jimmy’s and Beezy’s brains, the boys vie for title of fastest Miseryvillian. --- Jimmy tries Heloise’s ‘People Copier’ and ends up with an army of ‘Himmies’ who mimic his every move.

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: Jimmy suspects that his new neighbor is really the thing he fears most… a giant pickle. --- Jimmy and Beezy vie to join the Rodeo Clown's 'Cool Clown Club'.

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: Jimmy turns the tables on Lucius Fools Day, the one day a year when Lucy gets to inflict more misery than usual. --- After accidentally lopping off Lucius’ horns, Jimmy must turn to one of Heloise's concoctions to make things right.

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: When the Heinous Museum is under attack, Heloise and Jimmy are pressed into security service. --- Lucius and the Weavils sign a peace treaty forcing Beezy to marry the unsightly Princess Weavil.

programme.title: Jimmy Two Shoes
programme.desc: After Beezy crushes the commander of the Gnomans, the tiny army of laborers makes him their new leader. --- When Heloise catches a mean case of the hiccups, the boys must (for once) take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Kayla begins college and reconnects with an old high school friend, Brianna explores her newfound post-breakup independence, and Jade and Sean try counseling.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna defends her new boyfriend to her sister, Bar makes peace with Ashley's family, Kayla and Stephan come together for Izaiah's medical treatment, and Sean bails on Jade.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Lexi and Kyler go on spring break, Brianna asks Robert to move to Oregon, Ashley gets into a brawl with Bar's mom, and Kayla tries to fix Stephan's relationship with her mom.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna prepares to move to Oregon with her new boyfriend Robert, Kayla urges Stephan to mend fences with her mom, and Lexi puts her foot down and stands up to Kyler.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Stephan is ordered to pay Kayla child support, Ashley tries to be supportive of Bar's family while his brother is on trial, and Lexi pushes Kyler to be more responsible.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Ashley considers a fresh start, Lexi pursues her dream job, Kayla deals with Stephan's violent outburst, Brianna regrets her family's move, and Jade celebrates her birthday.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Ashley sits down with Bar's mom, Jade and Sean come together when Kloie gets sick, Kyler makes a bet with Lexi, Kayla faces a big decision, and Brianna and her mother clash.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Ashley's peace with Bar's mom is short lived, Brianna second guesses her relationship, Kayla makes plans for the future, Lexi's caught in the middle, and Sean helps Jade out.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Lexi's parents confront her about their problems with Kyler, Ashley and Bar take some space from each other, and Brianna struggles to make up her mind about Robert.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna asks Robert to move back home, Jade makes Sean take a drug test, and Ashley picks up the pieces after a fight with Bar turns physical.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Ashley has a hard time accepting Bar's apology, Lexi's parents leave Kyler out of a family camping trip, and Kayla's plan to move in with a friend hit a snag.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant
programme.desc: Brianna ends her relationship with Robert, Lexi visits a friend in college, Ashley moves back in with her mom, and Jade begins paying for Sean's treatment.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young + Pregnant

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan y Norma tienen un encuentro apasionado y se citan fuera de la hacienda. Gabriela confía ciegamente en Fernando, le da dinero para una supuesta inversión con su amigo Armando.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Eloísa inventa una serie de chismes Michelle. Ante su desaparición, Hugo decide ir tras ella, pero nadie se imagina lo que va a suceder con Aurora mientras él sale de viaje.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Alcides se defiende y le asegura a Soledad, a Esther y a Boris que no tiene a la niña, mientras que Aurora es abandonada a su suerte en la cabaña para que incriminen a Alcides.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Daniel propone impedir la entrada de los hermanos Medina en casa de los Obregón. Hugo se opone, mientras Alcides tiene una idea para convencerlos a todos de la partida de Michelle.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Soledad recibe una importante noticia del juez y Lucas pide que se investigue quién secuestró a su nieta. Antonia acepta ser pianista en el taberna, se disfraza para que no la reconozcan.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Constanza le cuenta a Rodrigo todo el calvario vivido en el manicomio; también le habla de su relación con Gabriela y Lucho. David se muda a casa de Francisca y Antonia enfurece. Los guardaespaldas de Verónica salvan a Gastón de un atentado.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Constanza arremete contra Aníbal y jura llevarlo ante la justicia. El senador Villegas pide perdón y se queja de su salud. Antonia y Verónica saben que la guerra está declarada. Rodrigo duda de la identidad de Dantés. David y Cecilia se reconcilian.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Constanza enfrenta a Antonia delante de todos. La acusa de beneficiarse de su encierro y del de Gabriela para apoderarse del Chamuco. Guerra encuentra una nueva aliada. Aníbal se recupera de su infarto y ya no es senador. La salud de Lucía empeora.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Irene le pide perdón a Verónica y horas más tarde recibe una carta de Gabriela donde dice: “Te perdono”. Constanza quiere demostrar que Antonia es cómplice de Aníbal Villegas. El senador tiene las cuentas congeladas. Guerra prepara una coartada.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: La venganza contra los Elizondo está en peligro, Juan se enfrenta con sus propios sentimientos. Sara y Jimena son invitadas al bar, mientras Rosario recibe una noticia al terminar su show.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan entra sin permiso en la habitación de Norma y la besa, él queda asombrado por su reacción. Gabriela acuerda el noviazgo de sus hijas menores con los sobrinos de su amiga Raquel.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Fernando busca intimidad con Norma, ella solo piensa en Juan. Sarita le dice a Jimena que no se meta en su decisión de comprometerse con Leandro y le explica sus intenciones a Franco.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan y Norma tienen un encuentro apasionado y se citan fuera de la hacienda. Gabriela confía ciegamente en Fernando, le da dinero para una supuesta inversión con su amigo Armando.

programme.title: La traición

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One team considers using their precious Express Pass after playful Ghanaian locals give some teams a headache while they struggle to complete the high-stakes roadblock.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: A challenging detour tests one couple's relationship, while another team's Racer requires medical attention, threatening their position in the competition.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: After teams volunteer at a local school in Ghana, THE AMAZING RACE makes it's first-ever trip to the Arctic Circle, where one couple finds themselves in an unfortunate position and contemplate making a game changing decision.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: A vegetarian racer struggles with a difficult decision when faced with a Norwegian delicacy, and Teams face their fears of heights during a gut-wrenching Roadblock.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers struggle to complete their creative detours before putting in a proper day's work in the fields, where they discover the key to potato farming is manure.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams are clowning around when they learn a traditional Russian circus act, but it's no joke when multiple teams make a critical error and misread a clue, jeopardizing their positions in the Race.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Following a huge mistake, one Racer makes an important decision that will impact their team beyond the finish line and for the rest of their lives.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Tension among the teams runs high when, for the first time ever, two teams are U-turned and have to complete an extra task, jeopardizing their chances of making it to the final four.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: After Racers become violently ill during a challenge, the stress of the Race finally catches up to one team as a Racer threatens to qui.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final four teams travel to South Korea where they battle it out on water and ice to make the final three.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final three teams soar to new heights over Southern California, competing in the final leg for a shot at the million-dollar prize and, for two teams, the chance to become the first ever all-female team to win the series.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Eleven former Teams who fell short of winning the $1 million prize during their first Race around the globe will return for another shot.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams dressed as kangaroos continue through Australia where one Racer reverts to old habits as tempers start to flare, and another Team breaks down in tears from utter exhaustion.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: While in Japan, one team's hopes are shattered after a car crash jolts them to the back of the pack, and Racers get down and dirty in a pile of frigid mud.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie becomes jealous when his father appears to be paying special attention to a pretty girl -- even taking her fishing with them.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Three escaped female convicts imprison Barney Fife and Floyd the barber in a remote cabin.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee longs for a pretty bed jacket for her birthday but seems destined to get more practical gifts from her family.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney Fife is convinced that Opie's piggy bank is safer than the Mayberry bank-and sets out to prove his point.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie must either learn how to box or lose prestige among his peers when a new boy moves into town.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney gives a parking ticket to the Governor's car, and refuses to tear it up.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A car containing a high-powered businessman breaks down in low-powered Mayberry.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney Fife is sure that a Main Street gun duel is in the offing when an ex-con comes to town.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Mayberry fears disaster when the sheriff discovers that a farmer's goat has eaten a good-sized meal of dynamite.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Barney look forward to seeing their high school sweethearts when the Mayberry Class of '45 holds a reunion.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A poor farmer successfully auditions to sing at a concert. Barney and Andy take it upon themselves to spruce him up for the event.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie meets a spoiled youngster and decides his own allowance should be tripled.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy uses common sense and Barney uses modern criminal detection methods to solve several burglaries at a filling station.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: The sheriff's knowledge of American history is put to the test by Opie and an attractive new history teacher.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee falls for the sales pitch of a fast-talking medicine man and his Indian elixir.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: The sheriff has his hands full as a clan of mountain musicians descend on Mayberry to meet a bus.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: An English tourist works off his reckless driving fine by being a valet and chauffeur for Andy.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Deputy Barney Fife invests his life's savings in a used car that turns out to be a lemon.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie suffers from puppy love so Barney attempts to show him how to handle women.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney decides that it's time to push Andy into matrimony, but Barney's marriage bureau collapses at a frantic dinner party.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A pack of hunting dogs overruns the Mayberry Courthouse just as Andy is trying to impress a visiting state official.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Howard Morris guest stars as Ernest T. Bass as the Darling clan returns to Mayberry with its own kind of mountain trouble.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney Fife becomes super-efficient in executing his duties as a deputy sheriff after two thieves are jailed in Mayberry until their accomplices are captured.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie accidentally kills a bird with a slingshot and becomes foster-mother to her three young birds.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy, Barney and Gomer are a trio of laughs as they tread the boards of a haunted house.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Guest star Howard Morris plays the part of a mountain man very disgruntled with being rejected by the army.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A visiting preacher urges the residents of Mayberry to relax and enjoy the simple pleasures of life--leading to more work for all.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Just a few quick, color-filled strokes and a little shanty with crisp evergreens and bright meadow appear - paint with Bob Ross!

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Majestic snow-covered peaks and evergreens loom over lush green grasslands as Bob Ross takes you into his world of natural beauty.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Surround yourself with this gorgeous Bob Ross painting; there's plenty of thick, velvety green grass, trees and foliage to just lose yourself in!

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Sneak away into the cold shadows with Bob Ross and enjoy the beauty of a winter night at the foot of a large fierce waterfall.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Guest Artist Joyce Ortner captures the true beauty of the ocean waves, blue and enchanting in this breathtaking seascape masterpiece.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Capture a vision of glory with Bob Ross as you view the brilliance of afternoon sunlight peeking over a distant mountain top.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: The mysterious night sky is pierced by amazing lunar rays which Bob Ross uses to illuminate a mighty mountain.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathleen share a boating adventure exploring the animal-rich rainforest surrounding the Panama Canal, including Howler and Capuchin monkeys and the deadly Fer de Lance snake.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack travels to Canada to check out four World Heritage sites in beautiful Alberta.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Animal Hospitals
programme.desc: Jack visits the doctors and hospitals that care for creatures big and small – from Silverback Gorillas and lightning-quick cheetahs to pet pigs and rescued possums. Today, see some of the world’s outstanding animal hospitals in action!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: A Horse Unless of Course
programme.desc: If you thought horses were cool, just wait until you meet some of their surprising relatives! Rhinos, tapirs, donkeys, zebras and the Horse Whisperer himself!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: On the Brink
programme.desc: For the animals on today’s countdown, like black rhinos, mountain gorillas and wild dogs, life is all about survival. Come along as Jack goes to ends of Earth to share seven spectacular stories of species on the brink.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: The people of Maui love the endangered humpback. Join Jack, a group of seaworthy school children and the Pacific Whale Foundation for a first-rate expedition to observe these 40-ton gentle giants.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wickedly Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along if you dare as Jungle Jack is counting down hair-raising true stories from the sea, land and air! Face-to-face encounters with bats, caiman, snakes, plus real dragons, on this Wickedly Wild Countdown.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Need for Speed
programme.desc: Today’s countdown is taking a ride in the fast lane with some of nature’s speediest creatures…horses, kangaroos, cheetah, falcons and more. Don’t blink! You might miss one of today’s super-sonic species.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is taking his show on the road through sunny California!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: From the bustling city of Cape Town to the wild eco-systems in the African bush, Jack and his family discover how wildlife is faring in this beautiful country and meet the conservationists dedicated to protecting it all.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Travel with Jack, and his wife Sue, to beautiful Cape Town as they discover how South Africa's wildlife is faring in the big city! Then they hit the beach to hang out with a breeding colony of African Penguins.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack and his family as they immerse themselves into the elephant population at Zimbabwe's Hwange National Park. The Hanna's hide-out underground in a unique bunker at one of Hwange's watering holes.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is traveling across the globe to bring you his favorite zoo adventures! From Asia's Singapore Zoo to Healesville in Australia, Calgary Zoo in Canada, and Jack's home, see what it's like behind the scenes at some of the world's coolest zoos.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Supreme Survivors
programme.desc: Whether it’s braving rough seas, extreme temperatures or rugged terrain, or knowing how to outwit an enemy, the creatures on today’s countdown are supremely adapted to survive the extremes.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Tree Huggers
programme.desc: Today’s creatures seem to defy gravity with their ease in the trees! Orangutans, gibbons, bats, sloths, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack travels to the picturesque lands of Samburu National Reserve in Northern Kenya where he finds hope for animals like lions, gerenuk, and Cape buffalo that have been surviving through a long drought.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top of the Pach-yderm
programme.desc: Join Jack for a colossal countdown with the mighty pachyderms! From the biggest land mammal in the world, the African elephant, to Borneo’s pygmy elephant, Jungle Jack is counting down his favorite elephant encounters all the way to number one!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack and his wife Sue as they pay a visit to the sunny state of Florida's most unique and inspirational retirement home. They meet up with an amazing couple who is spending their golden years providing a safe and peaceful retirement for horses.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi trek into Rwanda's forest to see Colobus monkeys with their famous black-and-white markings, and hike a volcanic island filled with fruit bats.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he embarks on a safari through Florida's Everglades, where he comes face-to-face with alligators and rattlesnakes. And, a rare look at the Native American traditions of the Seminole Tribe.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for an adventure to Santa Cruz Island where he visits the mating grounds of giant Galapagos Tortoises. Then he dives into the Pacific Ocean for an encounter with Galapagos Penguins and Sea Turtles.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack gets a special behind-the-scenes look at a retirement home for chimpanzees where caregivers have rescued over 250 chimps that now live in large family groups on specially designed islands in Florida.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Panama's coastal town of Pedasi is a haven for sea creatures. Jack encounters a nesting Sea Turtle, before visiting Isla Iguana where he searches for Black Iguanas, a colony of Frigate Birds, and a whole lot more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack explores the unique ecosystems of Panama! The Central American country's lush rainforests, pristine valleys, and spectacular seas are home to rare creatures like bats, sloths, sea turtles, and poison dart frogs.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In South Africa, Jack checks out the endangered species breeding program at Sable Ranch. Jack's ranch adventures include a helicopter round up of sable and roan antelope, as well as the trans-location of a white rhino.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In Costa Rica, Jack treks through the pristine Corcovado National Park in search of the elusive jaguar. On a night hike, Jack comes face-to-face with the tapir, a rainforest relative of the rhinoceros.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In South Africa, Jack and his daughter Kathleen undergo ranger training at the Sabi Sabi Game Reserve, they learn to track elephants to a water hole and encounter lions, cheetahs, and leopards.

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Gopher's wealthy aunt (Jane Powell) meets a wealthy man (Howard Keel) and is afraid someone may discover her heartbreaking secret.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Julie falls hopelessly in love with a handsome doctor (Anthony Andrews).

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A provincial woman finds herself hopelessly in love with a paid escort, while Gopher sees the ghost of a man and wife still occupying a room aboard the ship.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A beautiful, fun-loving woman with a secret (Joan Fontaine) reunites with a former love (Richard Basehart) aboard the ship. Plus, an inept German detective almost turns the Pacific Princess upside down when his employer's jewels are stolen.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: As widow tries to set up her spinster sister with an English lord, Isaac's overtures to a beautiful girl fall apart when his new tooth filling starts receiving strange transmissions.n may lead to divorce.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: The ship shudders when an entertainer hired by Julie turns out to be an exotic dancer and he doesn't want his secret revealed. Meanwhile, Isaac learns that a former passenger misunderstood his advice and divorced his wife.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: An emotionally cold woman finds herself falling for a Romeo with hot ideas. Meanwhile, a widow's romance with an attractive dentist is hindered by her nosy, card-playing companions (Rose Marie, Jan Clayton, and Lucille Benson).

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: An emotionally cold woman finds herself falling for a Romeo with hot ideas. Meanwhile, a widow's romance with an attractive dentist is hindered by her nosy, card-playing companions (Rose Marie, Jan Clayton, and Lucille Benson).

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Capt. Stubing develops an unusual relationship with a lovely woman who is tasked with painting his portrait.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Gopher is shocked when he finds his old college roommate is different than he remembers. At the same time, an embittered and retired pianist agrees to perform again in order to pay for a handicapped woman's surgery.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Hairs and Fibers: The tiniest filament can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways. Investigators have come to rely on forensic evidence as fine as a carpet fiber or as innocent as an eyelash to crack difficult cases.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic psychologists delve into the minds of serial killers, explaining why, most often, they can be a friendly neighbor or the tenacious co-worker – the one who hides his or her dark side better than anyone else.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Weeks pass as forensic investigators search for even the smallest clues, only to find what they feared in their own backyard. In Canada, two people die suddenly of unknown causes, and their deaths may not be as coincidental as they first appear.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: At a crime scene, anything left behind or seemingly out of place is considered a clue. But a fire can extinguish everything in its path –challenging forensic investigators at every turn and making each arson a trial by fire.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Using science as their most powerful weapon, investigators must find these hired killers and make them pay the true price of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Lies and deceit can often throw investigators off the trail of justice. But when hard evidence contradicts a killer's story, police must use the clues to piece together the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some cases simply can't be solved with current technology or with the evidence at hand. But that doesn't mean they'll remain unsolved forever.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Entomology: Bugs have roamed the earth for 250 million years, but their intimate association with death is just now coming to life.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The tread of a tire, a single shoe print and even the shape of a bruise help investigators track down killers, based solely on their patterns of guilt.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Years after a murder has been committed, investigators use advanced DNA analysis to shed new light on crimes that have gone unpunished for far too long.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Arson Investigation: Insurance torchings, mob burnouts and arson murders: these crimes are designed to take all clues with them. But a solid case can be built from a heap of ashes.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Explosives Investigations: The crime lab is the place where science meets murder. In New York State, Eleanor Fowler opened a small package, which as mailed to her home. When she lifted the lid the box exploded killing her instantly.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drug trafficking has spawned a violent and deadly criminal underground. It's providing a challenge to forensic investigators devoted to cracking drug rings.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A southeastern Virginia community is stunned by a crime no one can believe. A pregnant woman murdered, her baby lost. Across the state, another town feels a similar shock, a brutal, random slaying in a most unexpected setting.
