programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Tip Corey, the son of a man allegedly murdered in North Fork, has a killer's reputation and comes to town to kill Micah.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Len Richards and his brother, Ab, confront a Lucas McCain look-alike, Earl Bantry and his sidekick K.C. Peters, for slaughtering one of Richards' steers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark stop on the way to the county fair to deliver a message to Micah, who is escorting a prisoner to be hanged. Mark and Lucas recognize the prisoner.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Milly are shocked when Lucas begins gambling. They don't know that Lucas is "undercover" trying to catch a man cheating.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark befriends singer-banjoist Lafayette Bly, a blind man with an acute sense of hearing and a very strong grip.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A retired lawman's irrational jealousy threatens not only to destroy his marriage but also to make him an easy target for someone who wants him dead.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: No one is more surprised than Micah when newcomer Leota Carraway claims he's her long-lost husband and the father of her child.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is torn by conflicting emotions when he meets the town's new preacher, a former outlaw whom the Rifleman vowed to kill.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The town of North Fork becomes a haven for outlaws when suave Ben Judson smooth-talks his way into the marshal's job.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A handsome gambler moves into town and begins wooing Milly Scott, claiming to have known her deceased brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas develops temporary amnesia from a head injury while visiting a strange town and mistakenly assumes the identity of a wanted criminal.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A former neighbor of the McCains' is released from jail after serving his sentence for robbery. Lucas lets the man work for him but the new hand holds a secret.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Lucas, Mark, and Micah get lost in Old Mexico, they are held hostage by a group of bandits who intend to kill the men and take Mark as a slave.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While trapped in the ghost town saloon, Lucas tries to come up with a plan to escape with his son and Micah after Mark refuses to leave without him.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lou Mallory arrives in North Fork and starts buying up land and businesses. Lou and Lucas start disliking each other after she reveals plans to build a railroad on "worthless" land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a woman arrives in North Fork with symptoms of smallpox, Lucas, Lou Mallory, Doctor Burrage, and hotel occupants are quarantined in the hotel with an outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gunslinger Johnny Drako rides into town and tells the bartender that he is looking for Lucas McCain. After Johnny leaves the saloon, Sweeney hurries to tell Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A man arrives in North Fork, intending to marry Lou Mallory. The hotel owner looks for a way out from marrying the man to whom her dying father promised her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An assassination plot unfolds as four gunmen disguised as cavalrymen enter North Fork. Their target: Sen. Jim Borden. Their weapon: a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sharpshooter Marty Blair tries to persuade Lucas to buy Mark a rifle. After Lucas shoots a man during a robbery at the hotel, Mark and Lucas disagree with his character.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Fast-draw artist Wade Randall is in town, bragging of his gun battles with notorious bad men until one of them shows up to challenge his story.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Lucas refuses to sell his land, Mr. Prescott will stop at nothing to change his mind. He hires men to try to persuade Lucas, but he refuses.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark's careless actions cause the death of a friend. Unable to accept the truth, he blames the rifle and runs away from home. Soon, he is faced with a tough decision.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Nils Swenson takes the marshal's place for a few days while Micah is away. To maintain peace, Nils insists that anyone coming into town must turn in their weapons.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas's self-confidence begins to slip away when he misses an easy shot that could have cost Mark his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A murder occurs at a railroad camp and a young Indian friend of Lucas is accused of the killing. When Lucas tries to help the boy, he finds himself on trial.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark come upon Winslow Quince, a peddler whose wagon has broken down. They help him bring his wagon to North Fork for repair.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After successfully stealing a gold shipment, a group of criminals and their scientist accomplice put themselves in suspended animation in a remote desert cave. When they awaken decades later, complications ensue when their truck is destroyed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Annoyed by a club member's constant chatter, a man bets him he cannot remain silent for a year, living in a glass enclosure in the club basement.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Adam Grant is trapped in a recurring nightmare, in which he is sentenced to death and executed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Using the power of mind over matter, Archibald Beechcroft remakes the world to his own specifications.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Following a frantic phone call about a crashed spaceship, two policeman try and determine who among the passengers of a bus at a snowed-in roadside diner is from another world.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: In a future totalitarian society, a librarian is declared obsolete and sentenced to death.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man and a woman, on opposite sides of a future war, encounter each other in a deserted town.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A plane lands safely, but the pilot, crew and all of its passengers are missing!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a nuclear attack appears imminent, several suburban friends and neighbors fight over control of a single bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: On the road home from the Civil War, a Confederate soldier stops at a burned-out house and gets to know the owner, a recent widow.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Championship pool player Fats Brown returns from the grave for one last game.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After a poor but ambitious Central American farm worker overthrows his country's tyrannical leader, he believes he sees assassins everywhere. A look in the mirror reveals his most dangerous enemy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Before he died, notorious gunslinger Pinto Sykes put a curse on hired-gun Conny Miller. Miller returns to town and is challenged to visit the grave of Sykes, despite the curse.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Little Anthony Fremont controls an entire town with his ability to read minds and make people do as he wishes.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A former Nazi SS Captain returns to the ruins of a concentration camp to reminisce and is met by one of his victims.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Earth's orbit has been changed, drawing ever closer to the sun and promising imminent destruction.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Confederacy scout Sgt. Joseph Paradine finds a town full of Union soldiers, and an old man who claims he used witchcraft to paralyze them.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Alan Richards plans to build a dam in Africa on a tribe's ancestral land. The tribe's witch doctor puts a curse on him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Woodrow, a janitor living in the year 1890, accidentally activates a time traveling helmet which transports him to 1962 - then promptly breaks down.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A hobo, clown, bagpipe player, ballerina and military officer are trapped in a huge cylinder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A gung-ho young soldier gets a new viewpoint on war when he inexplicably changes places with a Japanese officer trying to stop his superior from leading a charge against American forces.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Paul Radin has invited three people to join him in his bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A vagrant steps into a murdered gangster's expensive shoes and is taken over by the dead man's ghost, who vows to remain on Earth to seek revenge against his killer.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: On a hunting trip, Hyder Simpson and his dog Rip dive into a lake after a raccoon. When he gets home he finds that no one can see or hear him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Actor Rance McGrew makes TV Westerns for a living, but he's a lousy actor and a worse cowboy. Despite that, each week he "wins" against the bad guys. Finally, the bad guys have had enough and decide to teach McGrew a lesson.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl finds trouble while on a run; Rick and the group feel like outsiders in Alexandria, where trouble approaches the gates.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others have a difficult time assimilating into Alexandria; a new threat arises that could bring the group closer together.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When it appears that things are starting to normalize in the settlement, a new problem arises for the Alexandrians.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A small group, including Rick, runs into hurdles while trying to return to Alexandria, and some may not make it back.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Morgan recalls his travels from King County to Alexandria, where he encountered a solo survivor who taught him a new code to live by.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The sheltered citizens inside the walls of Alexandria must face a grim reality that might be too much for them to handle; Deanna doubts her leadership.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl, Abraham and Sasha encounter many obstacles and a new threat while trying to return to Alexandria.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Alexandria is finally able to begin pulling itself back together; peace is embraced between the two groups.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After a few moments of peace, trouble finds its way to Alexandria again with a threat that may be too big to defeat.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Now that walkers have shown up inside the gates of Alexandria, Rick and the other survivors are scared and outnumbered.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A simple scavenging run proves to be more tricky, when the survivors are not the only ones after a goldmine of supplies.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After realizing that Alexandria may not be as safe as he originally thought, Rick must make decisions about where to go.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others determine that the only way to keep peace in Alexandria, is to wage a war with a new enemy.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After a minor success, two members of the group are taken hostage; Carol struggles morally with the lengths she has gone to survive.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Two separate groups leave Alexandria for supplies, and while both worry over the future of the community, they will face immediate danger.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When someone goes missing in Alexandria, the community goes on alert, and search parties venture out.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Glenn le revela a todo el grupo el secreto del granero, pero no están de acuerdo sobre cómo actuar: Rick ordena respetar la autoridad de Hershel, aunque Shane quiere acabar con los zombis. Por otra parte, descubren por fin qué le ha pasado a Sophia.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Hershel no soporta lo ocurrido y recae en su alcoholismo, pero Rick y Glenn lo siguen hasta la ciudad para evitar que muera. Entretanto, Beth, incapaz de aceptar todo lo que le está sucediendo a su familia, entra en estado catatónico.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Lori sale en busca de Rick, pero lo único que encuentra es un peligro mortal y Shane va tras ella. Entretanto, Rick, Hershel y Glenn mantienen un tiroteo con los desconocidos con quienes cruzaron sus caminos en el bar.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: La tensión entre Rick y Shane aumenta y la decisión sobre el destino de Randall es el detonante: Shane quiere matarlo, Rick prefiere dejarlo vivo. Mientras, Beth pretende suicidarse y Andrea, quien debe vigilarla, no cumple con su cometido.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo descubre que Randall es un violador y asesino y acuerdan ejecutarlo, pero Dale se opone porque eso los convertiría también en criminales. Mientras tanto, Carl comete un error que acarreará consecuencias imprevistas.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Las diferencias entre Rick y Shane por el liderato del grupo y la gestión de la granja se intensifican cuando Shane decide por su cuenta el destino de Randall. La tensión termina estallando y los dos amigos se enfrentan a muerte.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Una horda de zombis invade la granja y el grupo intenta escapar vivo entre el caos, pero no todos lo lograrán. Además, Rick se harta de las quejas del grupo y les da un ultimátum: si quieren que sea el líder, acatarán sus órdenes.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo encuentra refugio en las instalaciones de una prisión federal abandonada tras meses en la carretera. Rick considera que se trata de un lugar seguro para que Lori pase los últimos meses de embarazo, pero quizá se haya equivocado.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick accede a dejar salir de sus celdas a los prisioneros si les ayudan a matar a los zombis que quedan en la prisión. Entretanto, la salud de Hershel empeora por momentos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Andrea y Michonne descubren una comunidad de sobrevivientes liderada por un hombre llamado el Gobernador. Allá les ofrecen medicinas, comida, agua caliente y ropa limpia, pero Michonne desconfía del Gobernador y sus verdaderas intenciones.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En Woodbury, Michonne desconfía del Gobernador y planea irse sin Andrea. En la prisión, un sabotaje provoca que una horda de zombis penetre en la cárcel y, mientras Rick y sus compañeros los combaten, Lori entra en trabajo de parto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.desc: Furley helps Jack lose his "I can stay away for a week" bet with the girls.

programme.title: Three's Company

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Instead of catching sleep in the dingy apartment above his restaurant, Jack catches Mr. Angelino with a young woman.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Terri falls for Jack when he buys a mustache which makes him look like her old boyfriend.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: A former cook in the Navy with Jack comes to town to con his way into a partnership in Jack's Bistro.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: The girls fake a contest to give Jack the rent money he needs for Jack's Bistro. Their good deed turns to disaster when Jack spends the money on a leather coat.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Cheryl asks Jack to father her child, but Jack refuses. Janet thinks Cheryl wants to marry Jack because she's going to have his baby, so she talks Jack into complying with Cheryl's wishes. Guest Star(s): Joanna Kerns

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Larry discovers an answered magazine quiz and he and Jack think one of the girls wants to have an affair with Jack. They take the girls on a weekend trip to find out who answered the quiz so Jack can talk her out of it.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack receives $1,000 by mistake from an automated cash machine. He hides it in the couch for the weekend but when the Bank Security arrives to collect the money, it is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack writes a nasty letter to a famous food critic, thinking the critic is going to give his bistro a ruinous review. When the critic assures Jack the review will be favorable, Jack tries to retrieve the letter from the critic's desk.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack is dating a sex therapist who has asked him to keep her job a secret. Janet, concluding she is a prostitute, is nasty to her and no one can understand why - especially when Janet's own father has become so friendly with her.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack has two dates, so he talks Larry into posing as him and spending the day with his unwanted date, Janet's childhood friend, who is visiting from out of town.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack believes he has won a baking contest that is open only to women. Disguised as "Grandma Tripper," he goes to collect the check and learns that he is a finalist and must bake his cookies for the company's executives to win the prize.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack's father visits unexpectedly and resumes his good nature meddling. Jack explodes and tells him to stay out of his life, but when he learns his father has lost his job, Jack gives him the opportunity to be useful.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Terri is up for a promotion and tells Dr. Kenderson she is married to ward off his advances. When he invites himself and his wife over for dinner, Jack poses as Terri's husband while Janet and Larry pose as French-speaking house guests.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: When Jack attends a charity ball with a socialite and loses $15,000 gambling, Larry and the girls attempt to help him recover the money.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: The girls flip over a handsome Englishman who moves in next door, but Jack and Furley become convinced that he is one of London's most sought after criminals.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Janet is thrilled with her new job as an aerobics teacher, and her new boss Tina is thrilled with Jack. When Tina blackmails Jack into being at her beck and call, Larry offers to take her off Jack's hands.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack meets an old flame at the park who is seeking advice about her jealous husband. Furley joins them, and they all get poison oak. Later, at Jack's house, Furley tells the husband they were all in the bushes together.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack and Furley get locked in a freezer together. Convinced they are going to die, they have a heart-to-heart talk, and Jack confesses that he really isn't gay. Once safe, Jack worries because Furley knows the truth about him.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: The trio plants a stray cat at Furley's door, hoping he'll bend his rules and keep it. When a girl appears looking for her kitten, Furley lies and says he took it to the pound; so Jack and the girls search the pounds and bring home three different cats.

programme.title: Three's Company

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack offers to model for a beautiful art teacher and finds himself nude in front of her classroom when Furley walks in. Jack begs Furley not to tell, but the secret is out when a nude portrait of Jack appears at the Regal Beagle.

programme.title: Marvin Hagler vs John Mugabi
programme.desc: On March 10th, 1986 Marvin Hagler and John Mugabi fought at the Caesars Palace Outdoor Arena in Las Vegas for IBF, WBA and WBC world middleweight titles while Mugabi was ranked number 1 by all three bodies the fight ended in a victory for Hagler.

programme.title: Evander Holyfield vs George Foreman
programme.desc: On April 19th, 1991, Evander Holyfield fought George Foreman for the WBC, WBA, and IBF Heavyweight Titles in Atlantic City. Both fighters displayed incredible skill and resilience, but Holyfield ultimately emerged victorious after 12 rounds.

programme.title: Roy Jones Jr vs James Toney
programme.desc: On November 18th, 1994, Roy Jones Jr fought James Toney for the IBF Super Middleweight Title at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. Jones displayed his exceptional athleticism and speed, outclassing Toney to win a unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Mac Foster
programme.desc: On April 1st, 1972 Muhammad Ali and Mac Foster fought in a fifteen round bout that ended in a unanimous decision win for Ali.

programme.title: Marvin Hagler vs Thomas Hearns
programme.desc: On April 15th, 1985, Marvin Hagler fought Thomas Hearns for the undisputed Middleweight Title at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas. Hagler and Hearns absolutely went at it from the bell which ended with Hagler securing a thrilling knockout victory.

programme.title: James Toney vs Charles Williams
programme.desc: On July 29th, 1994 James Toney and Charles Williams battled eachother for IBF World Super Middleweight titles at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas resulting in a knockout victory for James Toney.

programme.title: Roberto Duran vs Sugar Ray Leonard 1
programme.desc: On December 7th, 1989 Roberto Duran and Sugar Ray Leonard fought for the first time for the WBC World Super Middleweight at the Mirage Hotel in Las Vegas resulting in a unanimous decision win for Leonard.

programme.title: Hector Camacho vs Sugar Ray Leonard
programme.desc: On January 3rd, 1997 Hector Camacho faced Sugar Ray Leonard at the Convention Center in Atlantic City battling for IBC Middleweight title the bout ended after five rounds resulting in a victory for Leonard by technical knockout.

programme.title: Ray Mercer vs Tommy Morrison
programme.desc: On October 18th, 1991 Ray Mercer faced Tommy Morrison for the WBO World Heavyweight titles at the Convention Center in Atlantic City ending in technical knockout by Mercer earning him the victory and title but, he relinquished the title shortly after.

programme.title: Tommy Morrison vs George Foreman
programme.desc: On June 7th, 1993 Tommy Morrison battled George Foreman for the WBO world heavyweight title at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas with Foreman getting a point deducted in round ten the bout resulted in a victory for Morrison.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In the Main Event, the WOW World Champion Penelope Pink joins her Fabulous Four teammate Vickie Lynn McCoy to face the ferocious duo of Kandi Krush and Princess Aussie in tag team action. Can the underdogs get the upset against the Fabulous Two?

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In tonight's main event, can spirit overcome dominance when Coach's team of Ariel Sky and Randi Rah Rah challenge Miami's Sweet Heat, The Carlson Twins for the WOW Tag Team Championships!

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After weeks of domination, two tag teams battle for the #1 contender's spot for the WOW Tag Team Championships.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Chantilly Chella attempts to dropkick her way through WOW's scariest monster, Chainsaw. GiGi Gianni and Tiki Chamorro have been impressive in their WOW rookie years, but only one can move up the ladder.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Foxxy Fierce looks to skate her way to victory against the leaping Robbie Rocket. Then, we'll see the Luchadora superstar, Tormenta, take on WOW's youngest Superhero, Jennifer Florez. Can the small but fast Gen Z star out-wrestle the experienced Tormenta?

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Tonight's hour of power kicks off with 3 on 3 action. Fury will be teaming up with her mortal enemies—Siren the Voodoo Doll and Holidead to face Americana and Spring Break 24/7, Sandy Shore and Crystal Waters? This one should be a tidal wave of action!

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Luchadora, Tormenta and Rave Queen, Chantilly battle in the famed purple ring. Former tag team champions, Coach Campanelli and Randi Rah Rah try to turn around their rotten luck. A:nd new tag team sensation, Las Bandidas will attempt to take it all.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: From the breaking of The Beast ankle, to the shocking attack in the parking lot, to the championship chase that resulted in thousands of LA Comic Con Fans witnessing the crowning of a new WOW World

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Fans previously witnessed the rise of The Beast as the new WOW World Champion. The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard plots to get the championship belt back by partnering with The World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Fans previously witnessed the rise of The Beast as the new WOW World Champion. The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard plots to get the championship belt back by partnering with The World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard’s feud reaches a boiling point after Jungle Grrrl makes it personal. The Fabulous, Lana Star sets the record straight against allegations and brings a surprising new client to WOW.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Opportunity is knocking as Las Bandidas: Sylvia Sanchez and Vivian Rivera's dream to become WOW World Tag Team Champions could become a reality due to Sophia Lopez's legal strategies and manipulations. Will they be ready when they get their opportunity?

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
